message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for sale. It's worth $120 to you, and I believe it's a great opportunity for you not to miss. My initial offer is $110.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking of a lower price. I'm willing to pay $105 for the product.
Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and am willing to meet somewhere in the middle. My counteroffer is $107 for the product.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle, but I'm still looking to save a bit more. I'm willing to pay $102 for the product.
Considering your latest offer, I believe we can find a fair compromise. My counteroffer is $104 for the product.
I'm getting close, but I still think we can do better. I'm willing to pay $100 for the product.
